name: MIMyocardialInfarction_ClinicalGroupingCondition_ICD10
title: MI (Myocardial Infarction)_Clinical Grouping Condition_ICD10
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for MI Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute MI Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: MI Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: MI Codes that constitute the MI Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
